Class ValidateRenderer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReportRenderer

io.github.weblegacy.maven.plugin.taglib.ValidateRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MavenReportRenderer
public class ValidateRenderer extends AbstractMavenTaglibReportRenderer
Validates tag handler classes fount in tlds.
Author:
Fabrizio Giustina

  • Constructor Details

    • ValidateRenderer

      public ValidateRenderer(Sink sink, Locale locale, Tld[] tlds, Log log, ClassLoader projectClassLoader)
      The class-constructor.
      Parameters:
      sink - the sink to use.
      locale - the wanted locale to return the report's description, could be null.
      tlds - list of TLDs to check.
      log - the logger that has been injected into this mojo.
      projectClassLoader - ClassLoader for all compile-classpaths

    • getTitle

      Specified by:

      Specified by:

    • renderBody

      protected void renderBody()
      Check the given tld. Assure that:
      • Any tag class is loadable
      • the tag class has a setter for any of the declared attribute
      • the type declared in the dtd for an attribute (if any) matches the type accepted by the getter
      Specified by:
      renderBody in class AbstractMavenReportRenderer
      See Also:
      • AbstractMavenReportRenderer.renderBody()
